content.description: Sweet slab climbing up a beautiful quartz face.  Stand start in the thin seam left of Anarchist Crack, and go straight up.  Arete to the left, and Anarchist Crack to the right are off, but don't really come into play.
content.location: From the Flatiron, turn right and step over the low wall. Walk 50 yards to the Guillotine. The Nihilist is the obvious quartz face left of Anarchist Crack.

content.description: A short problem for the tall climber. Crimps and a high-step lead to an attention getting topout. Use the face holds between the aretes to ascend the slightly slabby face.
content.location: In the small alcove behind Anarchist Crack.

content.description: Make big moves on big holds to climb the arete to the right of Mezzanine Credit. Topout (crux) on the ledge above.
content.location: In the small alcove behind Anarchist Crack.

content.description: An enjoyable tight chimney climb. Get on it.
content.location: Just around the corner from the Anarchist Crack. Very clean chimney in a "S" pattern. Route number 45 in Sven's guide.

content.description:
Seeing as the Guillotine is a great area to get warmed up at, this is a great route to warm up your psyche.  The crux is right at the top trusting a tiny edge for a foot and reaching for the lip at the top. A must do while in the area.  

  Gopher climbs up the arete on a detached pillar split by the Guillotine chimney.
content.location:
The Gopher climbs the detached block split by the Giullotine Chimney. It is directly to the climbers right of Barefoot Crack.  

  It is route 53 in Sven's guide for the Guillotine Area.

content.description: Route 58 in Svens book. Another one better off bouldered. (Climb wall just right of corner to upper ledge. Continue on small holds to the top.)
content.location: Just to the right of the Anarchist Crack. Route 58 in Sven's book. Easily identifiable by the white streak of quartz running down the face of the route.

content.description: Another climb that is too short for a rope but easy enough to climb with out pads. It's a great area to warm up in before a day of climbing.
content.location: "Beer can full of roaches" climbs directly up the face of the boulder you down climb to get off of "Anarchist Crack".

content.description: Route 57 in Sven's book. Short but very enjoyable crack climb. Better off bouldering this route.
content.location: First good looking crack on the left if approaching the guillotine from the flat iron boulder. Route: 57 in Sven's book.

content.description: Problems on or around the Guillotine Tower.
